Text.Page:
The Mysterium is trying to uncover the secrets behind these giant stone towers. Some of us believe there are secrets to truly divine powers.

Regrettably, the nagas impede our research. My own power is inadequate to deal with them but perhaps you can serve as my proxy.

Gather a group and take out some {@LinkCreature:7#1#Naga mercenaries}. That would be a tremendous help.

Your prowess is considerable and will earn you much renown.

Now that the nagas are thinned out a bit, we can send reports back to the Sanctum Mysterium. May Oriyn light your way.
